title: Bingo Portfolio
short_desc: Portfolio website for Bingops, a Devops student. Made with ReactJS, TailwindCSS and based on a figma design.

title: Oslo's Toolbox
short_desc: An opensource website with a variety of tools (units converter, css generators, password generator, ip lookup....) for free.

title: Billie Eilish
short_desc: Design file based on Billie Eilish to learn figma, can be used on another theme/subject i keep adding more design to the file.

title: Aix-T-Tic Auto
short_desc: Website for Aix-T-Tic Auto, a family-owned auto repair shop in Aix-les-Bains, France with a strong reputation for quality and customer relations.

title: Sky Connect Trading LLC
short_desc: Website for a Dubai based company called Sky Connect Trading working in the crude oil, import, export, refining and general trading products.
